item.description:
Do you want to rekindle your childhood memories of going snow tubing with your parents? Now it is your chance! Join us at Nashoba Snow Tubing Park for some tubing actions! After snow tubing, we will head to Scupper Jack's for dinner, where you will find adult sized entrees to fill up your appetite.

We will group near the ticket counter at the end of the parking lot @ Nashoba Tubing Park. Since the group rate will not apply to us, we will get the 2-hour tubing tickets ourselves.

For dinner, I have made a reservation at 6:30pm, and that should give us plenty of time to have fun at the tubing park and regroup for dinner.

Please indicate whether you are joining us for both tubing and dinner in your RSVP, so I can get an accurate head count at the tubing park and for the dinner reservation.

Information on Nashoba Valley Snow Tubing Park:

  • http://www.skinashoba...
  • Group rate will not apply to us since it is only applicable after 5PM on weekends.
  • It will be $22 for a 2-hour ticket.


Information on Scupper Jack's:

  • http://www.scupperjac...
  • 3 Nagog Park, Route 2A, Acton, MA 01720

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Snow Tubing and Dinner
